title: Ok, So I Need To Know Why This Is Happening, Returning To Desktop After Champ Select.
body:
So, earlier today I went into a league game with my friend. Most of you right now are like: "Great, here's another goddamn silver complaining about being in silver"

But that's not why i'm here. 
So I went into champion select with my friend, and at the end of champion select, the window closes and I go back to my desktop instead of going into the loading screen.

I went back to my client and it says "game in progress" or something like that.

Weird.

I restart my client and press "Reconnect to game"

Still nothing, I go back to desktop. I've done this 1000 times and I still don't get into game.

Anyone have a fix for this? Can rito help me? Support tickets take days!

By the way, i'm on a Mac

replies.body: I also need help with this, can someone help me?
I don't wanna get punishment for this because i tried some bot games but won't let me in game
